name: Biohazard Double Feature
overview: Pure Evil: 2-pack is a compilation that contains the following GameCube games: Resident Evil Resident Evil Zero Also included is a trial version of Resident Evil 4. The later released PS4 / Xbox One / Nintendo Switch / Windows compilation called Resident Evil: Origins Collection with enhanced versions of the games does not include the trial version. It comes with support for 3D gameplay controls (opposed to the original tank controls) and a Very Easy mode for novice players.
